BuiltInViewInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT 
    main.顧客ID
   ,main.グループID
   ,main.申込タイプID

   /* 特記事項 */
   ,CASE WHEN (sub.special_note IS NOT NULL) 
   THEN sub.special_note
   ELSE main.特記事項 END AS 特記事項
 
   /* 初期セットフラグ */
   ,CASE WHEN (sub.default_set_flg IS NOT NULL) 
   THEN sub.default_set_flg
   ELSE main.初期セットフラグ END AS 初期セットフラグ

   /* 非公開フラグ */
   ,CASE WHEN (sub.private_flg IS NOT NULL) 
   THEN sub.private_flg
   ELSE main.非公開フラグ END AS 非公開フラグ

   /* 有効セットフラグ */
   ,CASE WHEN (sub.active_flg IS NOT NULL) 
   THEN sub.active_flg
   ELSE 1 END AS 有効フラグ
   
FROM
  (SELECT
       main.customer_id AS 顧客ID
      ,main.group_id AS グループID
      ,sub.order_type_id AS 申込タイプID
      ,sub.default_set_flg AS 初期セットフラグ
      ,sub.private_flg AS 非公開フラグ

      /* 特記事項 */
      ,CASE WHEN (sub.special_note IS NOT NULL)
      THEN sub.special_note
      ELSE sub2.special_note END AS 特記事項

   FROM
      m_customer_group AS main
      INNER JOIN m_group_order_type AS sub
      ON main.group_id = sub.group_id
      INNER JOIN m_order_type AS sub2
      ON sub.order_type_id = sub2.order_type_id
   ) AS main
   
   LEFT JOIN m_customer_order_type AS sub
   ON main.顧客ID = sub.customer_id
   AND main.グループID = sub.group_id
   AND main.申込タイプID = sub.order_type_id

ORDER BY
    main.顧客ID
   ,main.グループID
   ,main.申込タイプID
